sentence.Network_en: He always put his point of view with clarity and with courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是清楚而勇敢地提出自己的观点。

sentence.Network_en: The style is marked by simplicity, clarity, and candor.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种风格的特点是简洁、清楚、直截了当。

sentence.Network_en: This remarkable technology provides far greater clarity than conventional x-rays.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项卓越技术的清晰度比常规的X光高得多。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'glory, divine splendour'): from Latin claritas, from clarus 'clear'. The current sense dates from the early 17th cent

entry.tran: (书、论点等的)清楚，清晰易懂，明晰
entry.def: The clarity of something such as a book or argument is its quality of being well explained and easy to understand.

example.ex: ...the ease and clarity with which the author explains difficult technical and scientific subjects.
example.tran: 作者解释复杂的科技主题时的游刃有余、清晰透彻

entry.def: Clarity is the ability to think clearly.

example.ex: In business circles he is noted for his flair and clarity of vision.
example.tran: 在商界，他的天赋和远见卓识是出了名的。

entry.def: Clarity is the quality of being clear in outline or sound.

example.ex: This remarkable technology provides far greater clarity than conventional x-rays.
example.tran: 这项卓越技术的清晰度比常规的X光高得多。

entry.tran: (液体、玻璃或空气的)清澈度，透明度
entry.def: The clarity of a liquid, of glass, or of the air is the degree to which it is clear.

example.ex: The first thing to strike me was the amazing clarity of the water.
example.tran: 首先吸引我的是水的无比清澈。

means.word_mean: 1. free from obscurity and easy to understand; the comprehensibility of clear expression

sentences.sentence: "when she awoke the clarity was back in her eyes"

auth_sentence.content: Cancer Research UK said the study added important clarity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cancer Research UK said the study added important clarity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cancer Research UK said the study added important clarity.

auth_sentence.content: So let us seek a little clarity and calm.
auth_sentence.res_content: So let us seek a little clarity and calm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So let us seek a little clarity and calm.

auth_sentence.content: But the clarity is unsettling to say the least.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the clarity is unsettling to say the least.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the clarity is unsettling to say the least.

stems_affixes.word_buile: clar清楚,明白+ity状态→清楚状态

means.word_mean: 清楚, 明晰, 清澈

sentences.en: His writing has great clarity of style.
sentences.cn: 他的写作风格清晰易懂。

jushi.english: His writing has great clarity of style.
jushi.chinese: 他的写作风格清晰易懂。

jushi.english: He stated the market situation with astonishing clarity.
jushi.chinese: 他极其清晰地陈述了市场行情。
